metadata.title: LRIMa - Maisonneuve Computer Science Research Laboratory
metadata.description: LRIMa is an applied research and innovation space in computer science at Collège de Maisonneuve, specializing in AI, IoT, digital health, and smart agriculture.

hero.overline: Applied Research at Collège de Maisonneuve
hero.description: Each year, LRIMa brings together around thirty passionate students who design, experiment, and publish their work at national and international scientific conferences.

home.quote: The lab offers a rare opportunity at the college level: the chance to transition from student to researcher on real-world issues.

about.title: About LRIMa
about.description: Founded in 2015 at Collège de Maisonneuve, LRIMa is an applied research and innovation space in computer science. Our students work on ambitious technology projects, from artificial intelligence to connected systems, and publish their results at scientific conferences. Many projects lead to functional prototypes transferred to community, industry, and academic sectors.
